verses.roman:
kon sampradāye sannyāsa karyāchena grahaṇa
kibā nāma iṅhāra, śunite haya mana'

synonyms: kon sampradāye—in which community; sannyāsa—the renounced order of life; karyāchena—has made; grahaṇa—acceptance; kibā—what; nāma—name; iṅhāra—His; śunite—to hear; haya—it is; mana—my mind.
translation: "From which sampradāya has He accepted the sannyāsa order, and what is His name?"
